question: In which children?s cartoon series have you 'gotta catch em all'?
chain_of_thought_result: The phrase "gotta catch 'em all" is associated with the children's cartoon series "Pokémon." This series revolves around Pokémon trainers who capture and train various species of Pokémon creatures. The slogan emphasizes the goal of collecting all the different types of Pokémon available in the game and series.
